Class TlsECDHEKeyExchange

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TlsKeyExchange

    public class TlsECDHEKeyExchange
extends TlsECDHKeyExchange
    (D)TLS ECDHE key exchange (see RFC 4492).
